name: The Final Gunslinger
description:
Shoot your way through 70 levels of nonstop action! Experience the surrealistic dystopian future of 2044 as the Final Gunslinger in it's 7 chapters! Enjoy the groundbreaking and amazing story with it's surrealistic and simple graphics!

Armed with only a derringer, fight off hordes of androids and humans to assassinate your targets. Bullets can penetrate most enemies, time your shots to kill multiple enemies at once with one bullet!

Fight against many unique enemy types and bosses. Certain situations require unique and out of the box solutions. Can you defeat them all and save the world from Leviathan? Can you find and create your destiny?

Use WASD keys for movement and the mouse to aim your gun. Press left click to shoot. It's that simple!


-If an enemy is behind a wall, corner peek quickly to kill them.

-You can line up your shots to kill multiple enemies in a row.

-Most enemies die in one hit, but you do as well. Don't be reckless!

-Break out of the box...
